amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to restrict funding for diversity, equity, and inclusion officials or training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 254 (Roll no. 353).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mrs. Miller (IL).
